title: Easy freeway access, Bad Credit Ok, Free premium cable
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Laundry facilities', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Rent by the week or month', '-No long term lease required', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Free premium cable', '-Free utilities included with apartment', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
